title: Yup. I'm unranked.
body:
So yeah. Im unranked. Looking for people to play ranked with. Played only 4 Ranked Games. Lost all 4. Im a ADC JG and TOP player. 
IGN xSprint

replies.body:
I would suggest not plying ranked at the moment. You only have 1 rune page full, and that rune page is all tier 2 and they dont' really gel. Save up ip to get 2 complete tier 3 rune pages or at least 1 full tier 3. you could play with people and get carried through your next 6 placement games, but what happens after that? 

Not trying to be negative but I can see you ending up in a division you're less than happy with just because you're not well enough equipped for ranked at moment
Thanks for the feedback. Probably good I shouldn't play ranked though.
